title: The Most Listened To Conversation Of 2020 - Episode 174
itunes:title: The Most Listened To Conversation Of 2020
description:
What strategic shifts do churches need to make due to the coronavirus? 

This week, we take a look back at our most popular conversation from 2020 and dig into the practical ways that churches need to change their ministry strategies to continue not just survive but thrive in the new normal and continue making disciples.
content:encoded:
What strategic shifts do churches need to make due to the coronavirus? 

This week, we take a look back at our most popular conversation from 2020 and dig into the practical ways that churches need to change their ministry strategies to continue not just survive but thrive in the new normal and continue making disciples.
itunes:subtitle: The 7 Shifts Churches Need to Make to Thrive in the New Reality
itunes:author: Tony Morgan
